repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.unittitle: Burton B. Turkus Arbitration Files
did.abstract: The collection is arranged alphabetically by company name, except for Box No. 12 and portions of Box No. 13, which contain arbitration cases involving the International Organization of Masters, Mates and Pilots. Except as noted, all case files contain an Award. Most files, however, include much more documentation as is noted throughout the description.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection is arranged alphabetically by company name, except for Box No. 12 and portions of Box No. 13, which contain arbitration cases involving the International Organization of Masters, Mates and Pilots.
Except as noted, all case files contain an Award. Most files, however, include much more documentation as is noted throughout the description.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Burton B. Turkus Arbitration Files #5712. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5525: Local 1199 Additional Files 6004: NAA Additional Records
